about.me: Staking.rocks is a dedicated stake pool operator for the Cardano blockchain network and a passionate supporter of the project. We believe in the cause of the Cardano project. We are motivated by a vision of the future with more equality in terms of access to currency.
about.server: We run 3 cloud servers composed of 1 block-producing node behind 2 relay nodes, all geographically separate from each other for maximum reliability (Singapore, Tokyo and Sydney). Each server has quad-core CPU, 8GB RAM and enterprise-class SSD drive for optimum performance.
